channel.title: Should i ask my dad for my mouse back?
channel.description: ok.. my right clicker wasnt working on my mouse so i used my dads and put the broken one on his so then he got mad and gave me the beatdown for that and other reasons... and he took my mouse... but he hid the working mouse and is still using my broken one... but i found a new mouse to use... but i want my broken one back to play a game... what should i do to ask for it back? what should i say?

item.title: Should i ask my dad for my mouse back?
item.dc:creator: @poopy4231 poopy4231
item.description:
@poopy4231 wrote:

i am a retard

Read full topic

item.title: Should i ask my dad for my mouse back?
item.dc:creator: @system system

@system wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:8, topic:3257”]Show him your balls and say “You know what to do.”
If he kicks you, he’s done the right thing.[/quote]

lmfao i really laughed out loud at that

hmmmm say sorry for stealing your mouse can i please have mine back? hoooooooomie then

Show him your balls and say “You know what to do.”
If he gets on his knees, well run…
